argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | invid.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | invid.i | |- I = ( Id ` C ) |
| 3 |  | invid.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | invid.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Inv ` C ) = ( Inv ` C ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Iso ` C ) = ( Iso ` C ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_invid | |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) ( X ( Inv ` C ) X ) ( I ` X ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 5, 3, 4, 4, 6, 7 | #P_inviso1 | |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) e. ( X ( Iso ` C ) X ) ) |
